recipe.title: 3-Ingredient Seared Dates with Vanilla Ice Cream and Mint
ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil, plus more for drizzling
1/4 cup mint leaves, torn if large
instructions: Heat 1 Tbsp. oil in a medium skillet over medium. Add dates and cook, turning often, until lightly browned on all sides, 4–6 minutes.
Divide dates among plates. Add a few small scoops of ice cream to each. Drizzle with oil, then top with mint; season with salt.
